text: my name is Joseph Cletus I had the
business transformation for Lulu
Financial Group we have five businesses
under the Financial Group number one
being Lulu international exchange which
is into money remittance business
the second is tables retail then we have
tables food company we have a twin tech
division which is Arkin and the finally
2014 Holdings which is an investment
company when we started tables the
solution was hosted on premises from the
day one it was not going right we had a
lot of performance issues the each
service to make it up is to take not
weeks jump time up to months our days
actually started off with planning
meetings with the infrastructure team
where the the hosting partner used to
come on video calls and the day ended
also with the status updates but
actually finally when we take a submerge
nothing was walking on finally one day
the system had to crash ok it was
expected and it took us a few days to
recover the database when the system was
recovered my MD called me around 2:00 in
the morning and he asked me one question
now the systems are recovered do you
still want to go back to in the old
model or do you have any other option
AWS was the next best option for us so
we took only 5 minutes to make that
decision and around 4:00 in the morning
I woke up the entire team which is a 3
member and the IBM my partners we
started working on it we started
provisioning all the services by 4:00
p.m. the all the services were up and
running and we were like so in a matter
of 12 hours we got the services live up
and running we gave it to the users and
when we went to celebrate the values
that it we are right now on micro
services we are experimenting lambda by
mid of 2019 the entire infrastructure
will be on AWS Lulu international
exchange will see the reborn
architecture on lambda our server less
by 2019 the cost was actually always
less than what I used to run on premises
the next beautiful thing was like as I
mentioned Lulu in Dell actually exchange
which also financial ring was already on
AWS and we were having only three
member team managing the entire
infrastructure when we moved this new
large entity business entity also onto
the AWS
we never had to increase the team size I
could leverage on the team scene size
this was actually a major advantage for
a faster growing company like us
[Music]
